PropertyList.title: Junkers 390
PropertyList.line: max speed in Escape Setting 272 knots
cruise speed in Cruise Setting Setting 200 knots
0 - Cruise Boost, about 32 hours air endurance
1 - Take off and escpae boost, about 12 hours air endurance
2 - Crazy mode, unrelaistiv fast anf high, about 6 hours air endurance
